toadconfig.title: Settings of ToadLib-mods
toadconfig.refresh_tooltip: If config values cause errors, try reloading resources using this button.
toadlib.interpolation.quad_out.tooltip: Slowing down towards the end : X * (X - 2)
toadlib.interpolation.quad_inout.tooltip: Combines QuadIn & QuadOut : X < 0.5 ? QuadIn : QuadOut
toadlib.interpolation.cubic_in.tooltip: Look like Quad, but slower at the beginning and faster at the end : X³
toadlib.interpolation.cubic_out.tooltip: Look like Quad, but faster at the beginning and slower at the end : (X - 1)³ + 1
toadlib.interpolation.cubic_inout.toolti: Combines CubicIn & CubicOut : X < 0.5 ? CubicIn : CubicOut
toadlib.interpolation.quart_in.tooltip: Look like Cubic, but slower at the beginning and faster at the end : X⁴
toadlib.interpolation.quart_out.tooltip: Look like Cubic, but faster at the beginning and slower at the end : (X - 1)⁴ + 1
toadlib.interpolation.quart_inout.toolti: Combines QuartIn & QuartOut : X < 0.5 ? QuartIn : QuartOut
toadlib.interpolation.quint_in.tooltip: Look like Quart, but slower at the beginning and faster at the end : X⁵
toadlib.interpolation.quint_out.tooltip: Look like Quart, but faster at the beginning and slower at the end : (X - 1)⁵ + 1
toadlib.interpolation.quint_inout.toolti: Combines QuintIn & QuintOut : X < 0.5 ? QuintIn : QuintOut
toadlib.interpolation.exp_in.tooltip: A sharp acceleration towards the end : E¹⁰ˣxˣ⁻¹⁰
toadlib.interpolation.exp_out.tooltip: A sharp slowdown towards the end : E⁻¹⁰ˣx
toadlib.interpolation.exp_inout.tooltip: Combines ExpIn & ExpOut : X < 0.5 ? ExpIn : ExpOut
toadlib.interpolation.back_in.tooltip: Shifts below the beginning, then accelerates as it approaches the end : E * X * X * X - (E / 2) * X * X
toadlib.interpolation.back_out.tooltip: Accelerates towards the end, then 'skids' in value : 1 + E * (X - 1)³ + (E / 2) * (X - 1)²
toadlib.interpolation.back_inout.tooltip: Combines BackIn & BackOut : X < 0.5 ? BackIn : BackOut
toadlib.interpolation.elastic_in.tooltip: Accelerates towards the end while applying a rubber band effect : -2¹⁰ˣx * sin((X * 10 - 10.75) * 2π / 3)
toadlib.interpolation.elastic_out.toolti: Slows down towards the end while applying a rubber band effect : 2⁻¹⁰ˣx * sin((X * 10 - 0.75) * 2π / 3) + 1
toadlib.interpolation.elastic_inout.tool: Combines ElasticIn & ElasticOut : X < 0.5 ? ElasticIn : ElasticOut
toadlib.interpolation.bounce_out.tooltip: 'Inverted gravity jumper' animation : See ToadLib's GitHub
toadlib.interpolation.bounce_inout.toolt: Combine BounceIn & BounceOut : X < 0.5 ? BounceIn : BounceOut
toadlib.interpolation.sine_in.tooltip: Accelerates towards the end, less sharpness than Quad/Cubic/Quart/Quint : 1 - 1 - cos((X * π) / 2)
toadlib.interpolation.sine_out.tooltip: Slows down towards the end, less sharpness than Quad/Cubic/Quart/Quint : sin((X * π) / 2)
toadlib.interpolation.circle_in.tooltip: Look like CubicIn, but sharper : 1 - √(1 - X²)
toadlib.interpolation.circle_inout.toolt: Combines CircleIn & CircleOut : X < 0.5 ? CircleIn : CircleOut
toadlib.interpolation.catmullrom.tooltip: Smooth centripetal spline, good for animations : See ToadLib's GitHub
toadlib.interpolation.hermite.tooltip: More flexible and precise than Cubic spline. bias and tension can be adjusted (RMB on widget). : See ToadLib's GitHub
toadlib.interpolation.cubic.tooltip: Consists of CubicIn segments, the basis for Hermite and Catmull-Rom : See ToadLib's GitHub
toadlib.screen.interp.info: Most of the formulas taken from easings.net
toadlib.screen.interp.info2: X = progress(0 - 1). For additional info see ToadLib's GitHub
toadlib.config.interpolation_overview.to: Allows you to open the beta screen for selecting interpolations (Press 'I' key).
toadlib.config.showCfgButton.tooltip: Uncheck this box if you want the ToadLib mods settings button to stop appearing on screens.
toadlib.config.showCfgButton.tooltip_2: It will be possible to enable it only through the config file!
toadlib.config.showCfgButton.deprecation: Catalogue is installed, customization makes no sense.
toadlib.config.tooltip_line_length.toolt: Maximum length of the tooltip line. 170 is the vanilla value. Setting larger values may lead to errors related to tooltips.
